NK059(hi)004:1: // sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba chen po'i bshad brgyud kyi bla
NK059(hi)004:2: ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa bkra shis grub
NK059(hi)004:3: pa'i dbyangs snyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK059(hi)004:4: ston pa kun bzang rgyal tshab rigs lnga dang //
NK059(hi)004:5: rigs gsum d+r+wa ma lnga dang rgyal po dzah ku ku r+aa dza in+d+ra b+h+au ti dang //
NK059(hi)004:6: sing ha r+aa dza rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:7: u pa r+aa dza go ma de w+ai'i zhabs //
NK059(hi)004:8: slob dpon ku ku r+aa dza phyi ma dang //
NK059(hi)004:9: ro langs bde ba rdo rje bzhad pa rtsal //
NK059(hi)004:10: pra b+ha ha sti rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:11: sangs rgyas kun dngos pad+ma sam b+ha wa //
NK059(hi)004:12: sgeg rdor sangs rgyas gsang ba bi ma la //
NK059(hi)004:13: rma lo rin mchog gtsug gyer rnam pa gnyis //
NK059(hi)004:14: zhang ston rgyal yon rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:15: gnubs chen sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho dang //
NK059(hi)004:16: ye shes rgya mtsho nyang chen shes rab mchog /
NK059(hi)004:17: ye shes 'byung gnas zur chen sh+aakya 'byung //
NK059(hi)004:18: zur chung sher grags rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:19: thugs sras ka chen bzhi dang sgro phug pa //
NK059(hi)004:20: nye ston chos seng gtsang nag 'od 'bar dang //
NK059(hi)004:21: me ston mgon po shes rab tshul khrims dang //
NK059(hi)004:22: rta nag bdud 'dul rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:23: sh+aakya 'phel dang byams pa seng ge dang //
NK059(hi)004:24: 'gro ston bsam 'grub sgrol chen sangs rgyas mtshan //
NK059(hi)004:25: gzhon nu dpal dang ye shes dpal bzang po //
NK059(hi)004:26: rin chen phun tshogs rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:27: nyi zla sangs rgyas 'khon rigs tshe dbang dang /
NK059(hi)004:28: dpal 'byor lhun grub bkra shis kun dga' dang //
NK059(hi)004:29: phrin las lhun grub 'gyur med rdo rje dang //
NK059(hi)004:30: ngag dbang chos dpal rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:31: rin chen rnam rgyal bstan 'dzin rdo rje dang /
NK059(hi)004:32: phrin las rnam rgyal phrin las chos kyi sgron //
NK059(hi)004:33: sangs rgyas kun dga' mdo sngags bstan 'dzin dang //
NK059(hi)004:34: phan bde'i 'od zer rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:35: khyad par rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mthar thug don //
NK059(hi)004:36: legs bshad nyi zla'i sprin gyi snang ba yi //
NK059(hi)004:37: gsal mdzad kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po nas //
NK059(hi)004:38: rim brgyud bla ma'i tshogs la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:39: gzhan yang gsang chen slob bshad snying pa'i srol //
NK059(hi)004:40: 'dzin mdzad rong zom chos kyi bzang po dang //
NK059(hi)004:41: rang byung rdo rje 'jigs med gling pa sogs //
NK059(hi)004:42: byin rlabs nye brgyud bla mar gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:43: brgyud gsum bla ma'i dgongs don bdud rtsi'i bcud //
NK059(hi)004:44: rmad byung thugs kyi gsang ba snying po'i rgyud //
NK059(hi)004:45: snying gi dpal ber stsol ba'i bka' drin can //
NK059(hi)004:46: rtsa ba'i bla ma mchog la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:47: zung 'jug 'bras bu'i ye shes bla med pa //
NK059(hi)004:48: rnam pa rtags kyi phyag rgyar shar ba yi //
NK059(hi)004:49: yi dam lha tshogs mkha' 'gro chos skyong bcas //
NK059(hi)004:50: skyabs gnas dam pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK059(hi)004:51: dag mnyam gzhi yi gnas lugs ji bzhin rtogs //
NK059(hi)004:52: bskyed rdzogs lam gyi rnal 'byor mtha' ru phyin //
NK059(hi)004:53: zung 'jug 'bras bu'i ye shes mngon gyur nas //
NK059(hi)004:54: mtha' yas 'gro kun 'dren pa'i dpal thob shog /
NK059(hi)004:55: brgyud gsum bla ma'i byin rlabs snying la zhugs //
NK059(hi)004:56: bshad dang sgrub pas snying po'i bstan pa 'phel //
NK059(hi)004:57: rtsa gsum srung ma dgyes pa'i gzi byin gyis //
NK059(hi)004:58: 'jig rten dge legs chen pos khyab gyur cig /
NK059(hi)004:59: ces pa'ang sgyu 'phrul brgyud 'debs la bshad bka'i phyogs
NK059(hi)004:60: kyi kha skong dang smon lam bcas mi pham 'jam
NK059(hi)004:61: dpal dgyes pas mdzad pa la /
